content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://completedata@ds310team8.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.fact_policy (
	[CountryName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CountryCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[RegionName] int,
	[RegionCode] int,
	[Jurisdiction] nvarchar(4000),
	[Date] datetime2(7),
	[C1_School_closing] float,
	[C1_Flag] bit,
	[C2_Workplace_closing] float,
	[C2_Flag] bit,
	[C3_Cancel_public_events] float,
	[C3_Flag] bit,
	[C4_Restrictions_on_gatherings] float,
	[C4_Flag] bit,
	[C5_Close_public_transport] float,
	[C5_Flag] bit,
	[C6_Stay_at_home_requirements] float,
	[C6_Flag] bit,
	[C7_Restrictions_on_internal_movement] float,
	[C7_Flag] bit,
	[C8_International_travel_controls] float,
	[E1_Income_support] float,
	[E1_Flag] bit,
	[E2_Debt_contract_relief] float,
	[E3_Fiscal_measures] float,
	[E4_International_support] float,
	[H1_Public_information_campaigns] float,
	[H1_Flag] bit,
	[H2_Testing_policy] float,
	[H3_Contact_tracing] float,
	[H4_Emergency_investment_in_healthcare] float,
	[H5_Investment_in_vaccines] float,
	[H6_Facial_Coverings] float,
	[H6_Flag] bit,
	[H7_Vaccination_policy] float,
	[H7_Flag] bit,
	[H8_Protection_of_elderly_people] float,
	[H8_Flag] bit,
	[M1_Wildcard] float,
	[StringencyIndex] float,
	[StringencyIndexForDisplay] float,
	[StringencyLegacyIndex] float,
	[StringencyLegacyIndexForDisplay] float,
	[GovernmentResponseIndex] float,
	[GovernmentResponseIndexForDisplay] float,
	[ContainmentHealthIndex] float,
	[ContainmentHealthIndexForDisplay] float,
	[EconomicSupportIndex] float,
	[EconomicSupportIndexForDisplay] float,
	[id] nvarchar(4000),
	[_rid] nvarchar(4000),
	[_self] nvarchar(4000),
	[_etag] nvarchar(4000),
	[_attachments] nvarchar(4000),
	[_ts] numeric(38,18)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'covidPolicy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.fact_policy
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://completedata@ds310team8.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.dim_country (
	[Country] nvarchar(4000),
	[CountryCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[Latitude] numeric(10,5),
	[Longitude] numeric(10,5)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Country.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.dim_country
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://completedata@ds310team8.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.dim_cases (
	[Updated] date,
	[Confirmed] int,
	[Country_Region] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'CompleteCases.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.dim_cases
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://completedata@ds310team8.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.dim_dates (
	[DateKey] int,
	[FullDate] date,
	[isWeekDay] bit,
	[DayOfWeek] int,
	[DayOfMonth] int,
	[DayOfQuarter] int,
	[DayOfYear] int,
	[DayName] nvarchar(4000),
	[WeekOfYear] int,
	[WeekName] nvarchar(4000),
	[MonthOfYear] int,
	[MonthName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalendarQuarter] int,
	[CalendarQuarterName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalendarYear] int,
	[FiscalMonth] int,
	[FiscalMonthName] nvarchar(4000),
	[FiscalQuarter] int,
	[FiscalQuarterName] nvarchar(4000),
	[FiscalYear] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Dates.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [completedata_ds310team8_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.dim_dates
GO
